dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to MASARI Academic Operations Platform.
dashboard.studentSubtitle: View your academic progress and upcoming exams.
dashboard.studentWelcome: Welcome to the MASARI Student Portal. Here you can view your upcoming exams, enrolled courses, and submit course requests.

courses.title: Courses
courses.subtitle: Manage academic courses and their details.

schedule.title: Course Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Manage course timetables and venues.
schedule.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this venue?
schedule.universityExamFileDesc: Upload the university central exam schedule file with the exam codes/numbers and timeslots.
schedule.courseDataFileDesc: Upload the course mapping file with course names, student counts, and lecture times.
schedule.conflictsDescription: Some courses are assigned to the same venue at the same time. Please review and resolve conflicts.

exams.title: Exam Schedule
exams.subtitle: View your upcoming exams and details.

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.subtitle: Course and section demand forecasting tools.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and application preferences.

home.title: MASARI Academic Operations Platform
home.subtitle: Streamline academic operations with intelligent scheduling and planning tools

courseRegistration.title: Course Registration
courseRegistration.description: Simplify the registration process for students and administrators.

sectionPrediction.title: Section Prediction
sectionPrediction.description: Use AI to predict course demand and optimize section offerings.

examScheduling.title: Exam Scheduling
examScheduling.description: Intelligent exam scheduling to avoid conflicts and optimize venue usage.

userRoleManagement.title: Role-Based Access
userRoleManagement.description: Separate interfaces for students, instructors, and administrators.

about.title: About MASARI
about.description: MASARI is designed to help academic institutions streamline their operations and enhance the student experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify academic operations through innovative technology solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading platform for academic scheduling and resource management.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in learning more about MASARI? Contact us for a demo.

courseRequest.title: Course Request
courseRequest.subtitle: Submit requests for courses you want to take
courseRequest.note: Your request will be reviewed by an administrator. You will be notified once a decision has been made.

roleSelection.title: Select Your Role
roleSelection.description: Please select your role to continue
roleSelection.adminDescription: Manage courses, schedules, and student records
roleSelection.studentDescription: Access your courses, exams, and submit requests
roleSelection.facultyDescription: Manage your courses and student grades
